column4: sudo netstat -pat to look wich process is listening on port 25
Thanks.  I did as you suggested.  I grepped for 25 but did not find any listening connection.  telnet to localhost 25 works fine.
Thanks for helping.  Looks like I was experiencing https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/exim4/+bug/48045 exim will not stop on dapper if told to.
